data.eml:eml: Revision of the New World species of the genus Dinotrema (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Alysiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Peris-Felipo, Frаncisco Jаvier, Belokobylskij, Sergey А. (2018): Revision of the New World species of the genus Dinotrema (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Alysiinae). Zootaxa 4382 (1): 1-55, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4382.1.1
